definition: surname Yi/abbr. for 伊拉克[Yi1 la1 ke4], Iraq/abbr. for 伊朗[Yi1 lang3], Iran

(old) third person singular pronoun ("he" or "she")/second person singular pronoun ("you")/(May 4th period) third person singular feminine pronoun ("she")/(Classical Chinese) introductory particle with no specific meaning/that (preceding a noun)

sentences.english: Trend traders use an initial risk rule that determines position size at the time of entry.
sentences.chinese: 趋势交易者买进伊始，便设立最初的止盈和止损位置。

sentences.english: Which makes them at the beginning of the Tiger issued a sonorous voice of the turn.
sentences.chinese: 这使得他们在虎年伊始发出了铿锵有力的转折之声。

sentences.english: The teams get to ask questions at the beginning of the class.
sentences.chinese: 各个团队在上课伊始就开始提出问题。

sentences.english: Hoffenheim were instantly dismissed by many as cannon fodder after their promotion last season.
sentences.chinese: 霍芬海姆上赛季升入甲级伊始就被众球队当做是炮灰。

sentences.english: He made his first-team breakthrough at River Plate earlier this season.
sentences.chinese: 本赛季伊始，他被提升至河床的一线队。

sentences.english: It was Nasri's job to attack United's right-back Rafael in the early minutes.
sentences.chinese: 比赛伊始，纳斯里的职责是攻击曼联右后卫拉斐尔。

sentences.english: When the fight began, he thought it politic to leave.
sentences.chinese: 战斗伊始，他就想到走为上策。

sentences.english: From the outset, half of the bank’s net profits were claimed by the crown.
sentences.chinese: 从发行伊始，银行一半的纯利润都要归王室所有。

sentences.english: There have been some big shifts in fortune since the first rumblings of the crisis, five years ago.
sentences.chinese: 自五年前经济危机伊始，全球财富进行了一些大洗牌。

sentences.english: When you are born, you were crying and everyone around you was smiling.
sentences.chinese: 出生伊始，哭啼的是你，周围的人却在微笑。

sentences.english: With the beginning of the new year, everything takes on a new look.
Chinese historical philosophy thinking began at the original of history.
sentences.chinese: 中国的历史哲学思想在史学伊始之初便产生了。

sentences.english: Hoover’s indecisiveness handed his successor a triumph at the very start of his presidency.
sentences.chinese: 胡佛的优柔寡断让他的继任得以在履新伊始旗开得胜。

sentences.english: What should a boss's attitude be at the start of the new year?
sentences.chinese: 新年伊始，一个老板的态度应该是什么？

sentences.english: The new author has become a celebutante since the beginning of the year.
sentences.chinese: 新年伊始，那名新作家就成了名流新宠。

sentences.english: Everyone tries to clean his or her home and to start the year with some new clothes.
sentences.chinese: 每个人都要打扫自己家，并要在新年伊始穿新衣。

definition: to begin/to open/to start/beginning of an event
to take the lead/to show initiative
